data.description: Result to be released privately via the Geometric mechanism. Member data type must be integer.

lower.description: Lower bound of the statistic to be privatized. Member data type must be integer.

upper.description: Upper bound of the statistic to be privatized. Member data type must be integer.

name: simple_geometric_mechanism

privacy_usage.description: Object describing the type and amount of privacy to be used for the mechanism release. Values of zero or less, and values of greater than one, will result in warnings.

return.description: Original data perturbed with Geometric noise.

description: Privatizes a result by returning it perturbed with Geometric noise.
